tag.description: Registers a BeanValidator for the parent input component

attribute.description: EL expression that resolves to a setting. Be aware that a tag handler like this runs at view build time, so an EL expression referencing an iteration variable of a ui:repeat will not work. In case you need to validate a setting in such a repeating construct, do not use this property and use 'settingVar' instead
attribute.name: setting

attribute.description: A string that matches the name of an iteration variable like in a ui:repeat or a h:datatable. The variable is resolved to the current iteration variable during validation
attribute.name: settingVar

attribute.description: Determines to which component this validator is bound, useful for referencing a component within a composite component.
attribute.name: for
